text: Looking into this now - thank you for pointing it out!

Hello <@U076KCUDG9M>, just getting back to this. You should be able to:
• Either use a `Form` with an `Input` component and have the `Button` type as `submit`. Pressing enter will call `onSubmit` and submit the form.
• Or if you want to use `TextArea`, wrap it in a form with a submit `Button`
Does that help?
I'm sure you've found this already, but closing the loop that <https://developers.HubSpot.com/beta-docs/reference/ui-components/standard-components/modal|Modal> has been released:white_check_mark:
